subject: IMMEDIATE RELEASE OF YOUR FUND US$5,900,000.00 THOUSAND USD ONLY VIA ATM VISA CARD
body:
Attention: Marilyn, 
 
We wish to inform you that your email has been chosen as one of the scam victims in the past. The United Nation, World Bank, and Paris club have instructed United Bank for Africa  UBA, to process and release your restitution worth of US$5,900,000.00 (Five Million Nine Hundred Thousand United State Dollars) through an ATM CARD. 
 
We are very sorry for the plight you have gone through in the past. 
 
Kindly get back to me for further instructions. 
 
Thanks for your time and remain blessed. 
 
Congratulations! 
 
Yours Sincerely, 
Mrs. Agnes Maddisson

subject: Re: IMMEDIATE RELEASE OF YOUR FUND US$5,900,000.00 THOUSAND USD ONLY VIA ATM VISA CARD
body:

Best wishes,
Marilyn

subject: Re: Re: IMMEDIATE RELEASE OF YOUR FUND US$5,900,000.00 THOUSAND USD ONLY VIA ATM VISA CARD
body:
Attention: Marilyn,

Your mail is acknowledged.

This is a United Nation Compensation Program and your email was selected so follow instructions to enable you to receive your Compensation Fund via Atm Visa Card. You are advised to forward your personal information as listed Below for immediate commencement of the Atm Card Activation process.

Your Full Names:.............
Contact address:..........
Telephone Number:..............
City:.................................
Zip Code:...................
ID CARD if any:....................

Please note that as soon as I receive your information as stated above, the concerned Bank will issue the Card in your name and the Copy will be sent to you via email attachment for your view before dispatch to your address.

Do not delay to get back to us.

Mrs. Agnes Maddison
Operation Manager
Telephone: +229 59 03 23 77

subject: Re: Re: IMMEDIATE RELEASE OF YOUR FUND US$5,900,000.00 THOUSAND USD ONLY VIA ATM VISA CARD
body:
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm interested in learning more about this United Nations Program and how I can receive my fund via an ATM Visa Card. Could you please provide me with more details on the activation process and how long it typically takes to receive the card once the necessary information is provided?

Best wishes,
Marilyn

subject: READ AND COMPLY
body:
Dear Marilyn, 
 
 You are advised to forward your personal information as listed Below for immediate commencement of the Atm Card Activation process. 
 
 Your Full Names:............. 
Contact address:.......... 
Telephone Number:.............. 
City:................................. 
Zip Code:................... 
ID CARD if any:.................... 
 NOTE: Upon receipt of your email, The United Bank For Africa (UBA) will commence the Atm Card processing which will be ready within 24hours because it takes 24hours to issue the Card from the Bank and once it's done, I will get back to you for the delivery process. 
 Mrs. Agnes Maddison 
Operation Manager 
Telephone: +229 59 03 23 77 
 
 
 
 Sent: Wednesday, February 28, 2024 at 4:49 AM From: "Marilyn" <aa99821@***.com> To: info.un@writeme.com Subject: Re: Re: IMMEDIATE RELEASE OF YOUR FUND US$5,900,000.00 THOUSAND USD ONLY VIA ATM VISA CARD 
 
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm interested in learning more about this United Nations Program and how I can receive my fund via an ATM Visa Card. Could you please provide me with more details on the activation process and how long it typically takes to receive the card once the necessary information is provided?
Best wishes, 
Marilyn

subject: Re: READ AND COMPLY
body:
Hello Marilyn,

Thank you for your interest in the United Nations Program. To proceed with the activation of your ATM Visa Card, we will require some personal information from you. Once we have received the necessary details, the activation process usually takes 3-5 business days. The card will then be shipped to your provided address via a secure courier service.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed, and I can guide you through the next steps of the process.

Best wishes,
Marilyn

subject: Re: READ AND COMPLY
body:

Once we have received the necessary details, the activation process usually takes a few business days. The card will then be sent to you via secure mail delivery.

Please provide me with the following information so we can move forward with the activation process:
- Full Name
- Address

- Date of Birth

Looking forward to assisting you further.
